I found Animation.jl to be helpful to make keyframes and then choose how to interpolate between them: e.g.

```anim_theta = Animation(
    0.0, -pi,
    linear(prewait=0.0, postwait=0.0),
    1.0, pi)
#linearly interpolate the theta values from time = 0.0 to time = 1.0, from theta = -pi to pi
```
then for each frame I can get the theta by doing
```current_theta = at(anim_theta, current_time)
